page.title: 06 Employment
page.content:
{Employment- cont. It is estimated that 60% of people in Burnhope are unemployed.Many employed people in Lanchester travel to Durham, Newcastle and Sunderland to work.The only employment opportunites are in Schools,shops,pubs and farms.(See Resources Centre P.17 )
{Houses The village of Burnhope is considerably smaller than that of Lanchester,although both have similar numbers of council houses_Burnhope 378,Lanchester 352.Burnhope also contains many N.C.B.houses and relatively few private houses (mostly terraced.)The oldest house was built in 1860's.There is no gas in the village- houses being heated by open fires.
